message.content:
cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.PL, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses a formal approach to deriving a software system specification from natural language requirements using Behavior Engineering. This falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also mentions the use of mathematical frameworks and techniques for detecting defects in requirements, which suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and systems and control (cs.SY). The use of a graphical specification language and the need for formalizing the integration strategy suggests a focus on programming languages (cs.PL) and machine learning (cs.LG).
